ygData.subject: Re: More clues from Lindell, third book confirmed, and more...
ygData.msgSnippet: OK thats it guys we need to power lvl ourselves to 50 take 10 of us with a good mix and 2 clerics over ther and kill that little necro till he drops the
ygData.messageBody:
OK thats it guys we need to power lvl ourselves to 50 take 10 of us with a
good mix and 2 clerics over ther and kill that little necro till he drops the
book... if he has the book. I have begged different gm's for any kind of a
hint and I did it rather well. In character, nothing no hint at all they will
not someone has to know someone that can help, if it is that necro that drops
it.. that is soo wrong by verant, cons red to lvl 46... that is just wrong
anyway just wanted to throw in my 2 cents.
